Box.SerializedObject: GSE /stopmacro [channeling] !if (character is in "Druid" and character is in "Tank")/cast [noform:1] !Bear Form !if (character is in "Druid" and character is in [noform:4] Moonkin Form !if (character is in "Druid")/cast
